title: Amazing Shoe App!
review: It's by far one of the best shopping apps I have tested out, never mind shoe shopping apps. Now I'm not much of a sneakerhead just beginning to root into it but this app makes shoe shopping a much more pleasurable experience. It offers some of the best prices, an authenticity service (will touch up on that later), 3 different conditions to choose from, and a great UI.How the authenticity service works is you buy the shoe and the shoe is then shipped to GOAT HQ where they conduct several comparisons and tests to authenticate the product. If the product is deemed authentic then they ship it to you, if not then the seller gets negative points to his/her marketplace account and you get issued a full refund. They also offer 3 main conditions which is a good feature. You can choose to browse shoes from factory new condition, new but defected, and used. This helps you decide what you buying this shoe for and the amount of money it could be worth. A nice feature about the app is that it has a very immersive customer support system. It's not a contact form but it's like you're texting someone and instead of being screened they almost, every time respond in a speedy manner. The only con is that you can't talk to the seller. This would be helpful if you wanted to know more about the shoe or if you want them to expand on the defect.
